dmca.title: Salomon brother impatient to have Hilton video off Google search
dmca.body:
Dear [private]:

I note that the Infringing Sites detailed in my first notice (see below) are still returned on the Google Searches delineated therein!
You've already had more than 264 hours!!! since my fast notice regarding these Infringing Sites.

For ease of reference, I include immediately hereafter my second notice to you regarding these Infringing Sites:
SECOND NOTICE

Via Signed Facsimile to [private] and Via email to [private] February 22, 2006 5:40 AM (California Time)

Subject: Continued Contributory Copyright Infringement by Google

Dear [private]:

I note that the Infringing Sites detailed in my first notice (see below) are still returned on the Google Searches delineated therein!
You've already had more than 124 hours since my first notice regarding these Infringing Sites, which first notice
